 <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎זוּ‎</span> **pronoun** (poetry), indeclinable. 

**1.** a **demonstrative** [[Hab.1.11|Hab 1:11]] <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎זוּ כֹחוֺ‎</span> ***this*** his strength, [[Ps.12.8|Ps 12:8]] <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מִןהַֿדּוֺר זוּ‎</span> (unusual, for <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎הַזֶּה‎</span>), [[Ps.62.12|Ps 62:12]] <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎שְׁתַּיִםזֿוּ‎</span> <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎שָׁמַעָתִּי‎</span> ***these*** two things &amp;c. (but: better (Wickes<sup>Post. Acc. 64</sup>) <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎שְׁ֖תַּיִם ז֣וּ‎</span> two things (are there) ***which*** &amp;c.: see **2**). **2** a **relative**, [[Exod.15.13|Exod 15:13]] <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎עַםזֿוּ גָאָ֑לְתָּ‎</span> the people ***which*** thou hast redeemed, v[[Exod.15.16|Exod 15:16]]; [[Isa.42.24|Isa 42:24]] <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎זוּ חָטָאנוּ לוֺ‎</span> ***against whom*** we sinned, [[Isa.43.21|Isa 43:21]]; [[Ps.9.16|Ps 9:16]] (feminine) <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎רֶשֶׁתשֿזוּ ָפמנוּ‎</span> so [[Ps.31.5|Ps 31:5]]; [[Ps.10.2|Ps 10:2]]; [[Ps.17.9|Ps 17:9]] (with a ***plural*** antecedent) <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מִפְּנֵי רְשָׁעִים זוּ שַׁדּוּנִי‎</span>, [[Ps.32.8|Ps 32:8]]; [[Ps.68.29|Ps 68:29]] (thou) ***who*** hast wrought for us ! [[Ps.142.4|Ps 142:4]]; [[Ps.143.8|Ps 143:8]]. To most of these paasages the remark made under <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎זה‎</span> **5** ==respecting the intention of the punctuators also applies==: compare [[BDB#De|De]] on [[Ps.9.16|Ps 9:16]]. (compare <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,R0lGODlhFgAgAIAAAP///wAAACH5BAAAAAAALAAAAAAWACAAAAJChI+pyxbfYgAzslmtelkf7m1dSJYkZDrjuaZuG6LSCjZ1cuNcK+t110PsKsOg8DfUyHYxFwVmycWMUWmVqnRqt84CADs=">, used as an indeclinable relative pronoun = <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,"> in the Tayyite dialect: thus <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,"> there has come upon them ***that which*** has come: <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,"> it is we ***who*** have done this. See [[BDB#Schu|Schu]]<sup>Hariri Cons. ii. 75</sup>, [[BDB#Thes|Thes]]<sup>406</sup>, [[BDB#W|W]]<sup>AG. i. 347, e</sup>, [[BDB#Lane|Lane]]<sup>p. 986</sup>, [[BDB#Fl|Fl]]<sup>Kl. Schr. i. p. 359</sup>.)
